# Getting started
Install and load the **statnet** and **Bergm** packages:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("acaimo/Bergm")
install.packages("statnet", repos = "http://cran.r-project.org")
library(statnet)
library(Bergm)
library(matrixcalc)
```

# Network data

We shall load and plot two datasets: (i) the Lazega's network undirected graph among the 71 attorneys (partners and associates) of the SG\&R corporate law firm; (ii) the Faux Dixon High School network directed graph of 248 students.

## Lazega's law firm
```{r echo=TRUE, fig.align='center', out.width='25%'}
load(url("https://github.com/lamprosbouranis/lamprosbouranis.github.io/Law_Firm_Lawyers_Coworker.Rdata"))

par(mfrow=c(1,3),mar=c(4,0,0,0), oma=c(0,6,5,3)) 

# Graph 1:
CC <- c("red","green")

set.seed(20)
plot(lf,
     vertex.col= CC[lf %v% 'status'],
     edge.col  = colors()[c(229)],
     vertex.cex= 1.5
)

legend("topright",
       inset = 0.05,
       legend= c("Partner","Associate"),
       col   = CC,
       yjust = 0,
       pch   = 19,
       xpd   = TRUE,
       cex   = 1.2, 
       title ="STATUS")

# Graph 2:
CC <- c("blue","gold","brown")

set.seed(20)
plot(lf,
     vertex.col = CC[lf %v% 'office'],
     edge.col   = colors()[c(229)],
     vertex.cex = 1.5)
legend("topright",
       inset = 0.05,
       legend= c("Boston","Hartford","Providence"),
       col   = CC,
       yjust = 0,
       pch   = 19,
       xpd   = TRUE,
       cex   = 1.2,
       title="OFFICE")

# Graph 3:
CC <- c("darkorchid1","cyan","hotpink")

set.seed(20)
plot(lf,
     vertex.col = CC,
     edge.col   = colors()[c(229)],
     vertex.cex = 1.5)
legend("topright",
       inset  = 0.05,
       legend = c("Harvard, Yale","UCON","Other"),
       col    = CC,
       yjust  = 0,
       pch    = 19,
       xpd    = TRUE,
       cex    = 1.2,
       title  = "LAW SCHOOL")

```
